summary: Financial market data visualization application with floating bubbles showing assets. Currently investigating why "No assets with high confluence found" message appears - need to analyze current data fetching logic and confluence filtering in the published version.
architectural_notes: Application uses floating bubbles to visualize financial market assets
Confluence filtering system currently not showing any assets
Need to investigate current market data source and filtering logic
known_issues: "Nenhum ativo com alta confluência encontrada" message appearing - no assets passing confluence filter

existing_features.title: Investigate and fix the confluence filtering logic in useBubbleAssets hook to ensure assets with convergence data are properly displayed instead of showing 'Nenhum ativo com alta confluência encontrada' message
Review and adjust the convergence calculation logic in useBubbleAssets to ensure it properly evaluates assets based on available Binance data (price changes, volume, market metrics)
Ensure BubbleVisualization component properly renders bubbles when asset data is available, with appropriate error handling for truly empty data states versus filtering issues

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix asset confluence filtering logic to display assets in floating bubbles
